segments.text: I'm really struck by the details in this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The line drawing perfectly captures the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the overflowing sink, itâ€™s just unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water streams so perfectly over the edge, creating a sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's face, it's just so neutral despite everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can a person be so unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool; it's practically horizontal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so close to tumbling backward, along with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager face is also quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely focused on the cookie prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a scene of domestic chaos frozen in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone comes out of this unscathed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer audacity of the children is also surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR
